definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: inf. abs.) always immediately after vb.; Ex 32:8 (J), De 4:26, De 7:4, De 7:22, De 9:3, De 9:12, De 9:12, De 9:16, De 28:20, Jos 2:5 (J), Ju Jdg 2:17, Jdg 2:23, Pr 25:8 (on Ps 69:18, Ps 79:8, Ps 102:3, Ps 143:7, where ´[[מ]] precedes, v. supr. sub [[מָהַר]]).
